title: 3 bed/1 bath/study/large, private deck
posting_body: Large 3 bed with study in charming building with fabulous Mid Cambridge location.

Located on a leafy, one way street, its an easy walk to Havard/Central/Union/Inman/Kendall Squares and several of the MBTA'S Red Line Stops (or you can catch a bus at the end of the block if you don't feel like walking).

This spacious, gracious layout includes an eat in kitchen, double living room with pocket doors, full dining room, study, many original details, lots of closet space, and a large porch that is exclusive to this apartment.
There is also basement storage, and coin op laundry in building.
You can park on street or there is rental parking available the same block if you want your own, dedicated space.
